dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Back in 2025, the Ministry of Education just dropped the final exam schedule for that school year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Back in twenty twenty five, the Ministry of Education just dropped the final exam schedule for that school year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Ministry of Education has announced the dates for final exams for the 2024"2025 school year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, I saw that. Ninth graders are testing from May 29th to June 10th, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, I saw that. Ninth graders are testing from May twenty ninth to June tenth, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Final exams for 9th-grade students will be held from May 29 to June 10, 2025.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly, and they've got four written exams in their core subjects.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly, and they've got four written exams in their core subjects.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Pupils will take four written exams in core subjects.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And for the graduating class—the 11th graders—their state exams run a bit later, from May 30th to June 16th.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And for the graduating class-the eleventh graders-their state exams run a bit later, from May thirtieth to June sixteenth.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Graduating 11th-grade students will take their state exams between May 30 and June 16, 2025.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and they're taking five exams total, with one of those being an oral assessment.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and they're taking five exams total, with one of those being an oral assessment.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The assessment will consist of five exams, one of which will be oral.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: An oral exam, huh? That's always a bit more pressure for students, I think.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: An oral exam, huh? That's always a bit more pressure for students, I think.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. But then, uh, certificate ceremonies are set for June 18th to the 20th.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. But then, uh, certificate ceremonies are set for June eighteenth to the twentieth.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Certificate award ceremonies for both basic and general secondary education are scheduled to take place from June 18 to 20, 2025.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So they'll have just a couple days after exams wrap up before celebrating.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So they'll have just a couple days after exams wrap up before celebrating.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and they also mentioned rescheduling the last school bell ceremony earlier this year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and they also mentioned rescheduling the last school bell ceremony earlier this year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, the Ministry of Education announced a change in the date of the last school bell ceremony.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, I remember that—it was moved up, wasn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, I remember that-it was moved up, wasn't it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Mhm, though they didn't give the new date in this announcement.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mhm, though they didn't give the new date in this announcement.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, the Ministry of Education announced a change in the date of the last school bell ceremony.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Still, it's good to have clarity on the exam windows. Less stress for planning.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Still, it's good to have clarity on the exam windows. Less stress for planning.
